page.title: 13BIGLAND ESTATE-HOLKER MOSS
page.content: The{Bigland}family have lived in this area since the time of the Norman Conquest.The land was farmed by the Biglands until about 40 years ago.Now a large proportion of the land is rented out. Bigland Hall is a fairly large country residence with its own chapel and large gardens.It now offers country based sporting facilities. These include :-{ {Horse riding }with the use of 35 horses,tracks and many jumps. {Trout fishing}in a man made lake and {Coarse fishing}for perch,pike,roach, eels and carp. These facilities are all offered in an attractive and secluded environment of hills and woodland.
